pages.text: Farmer's Delight expands your culinary options with a wide variety of new crops, meals, and cooking mechanics. $(br2)Gather ingredients, grow crops, and craft delicious dishes to satisfy your hunger in style.
Start by crafting a Cooking Pot and cutting board. $(br2)Grow new crops like tomatoes, cabbages, and onions, then cook them into hearty meals using the Cooking Pot.
Prepare sandwiches, stews, and other meals with unique effects. $(br2)Use the cutting board to slice vegetables, butcher meats, and prepare your ingredients before cooking.

Farmer's Delight has many add-on mods included in this pack: $(br2)- Chef's Delight $(br)- Ocean's Delight $(br)- Alex's Delight $(br)- End's Delight $(br)- Nether's Delight $(br)- Create Slice 'n Dice $(br2)Find detailed information about these add-ons in other parts of the book.
